title: Camera broken after December update
content:
After a security update in December 2019, the main camera stopped working. When I start the Google Camera application, it closes. When using external applications, the front camera only works, the rear one gives the error "Cannot connect to the camera." I updated the application, rolled back the update, reset the cache and wipe data of the Camera application, completely reset the phone - nothing helps, the camera crashes.

I recorded a video: https://youtu.be/4Uo4awKrpWY

I collected the logs using adb logcat: https://pastebin.com/Lxn9Y8JL

The phone did not drop, the camera broke itself
